content: छेदन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [छिद् भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Cutting asunder, dividing, splitting. {@--2@} Destroying, solving, removing. --नं {@--1@} Cutting, tearing, cutting off, splitting, dividing; <ls>Ms. 8. 280</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">292</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">322.</ls> {@--2@} A section, portion, bit, part. {@--3@} Destruction, removal. {@--4@} Division.
